definition: abbr. for 眾議院|众议院[Zhong4 yi4 yuan4], House of Representatives
to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries

sentences.english: They should exercise leadership over trade unions, the Communist Youth League and other mass organizations, rally the workers around them.
sentences.chinese: 领导工会和共青团等群众组织，团结凝聚职工群众。

sentences.english: We shall give full play to the functions of non-governmental organizations in studying and working.
sentences.chinese: 学习和工作中要充分发挥群众组织的作用。

sentences.english: The union at universities is the mass organization of university faculty under the leadership of the Party.
sentences.chinese: 高校工会是党领导下的教职工群众组织。

sentences.english: Yeah, I joined the mass organization.
Article 2 Trade unions are mass organizations of the working class formed by the workers and staff members on a voluntary basis.
sentences.chinese: 第二条工会是职工自愿结合的工人阶级的群众组织。

definition: to do with the masses/mass (meeting, movement etc)
youth corps/youth wing of a political party
Communist Youth League of China/China Youth League
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Gong4 chan3 zhu3 yi4 Qing1 nian2 tuan2

definition: the Save the Nation Anti-Japanese Protest Movement stemming from the Manchurian railway incident of 18th July 1931 九一八事變|九一八事变
